full_summary:
### FW061-240001 B - River Surveyor

#### Reference Number
WS4094547056-Doc4300413047

#### Amendment Number
0

#### Solicitation Number
WS4094547056

#### Publication Date
2023-11-09

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-11-24T14:00:00 (Expired)

#### Procurement Description
The Canadian Hydrographic Service (CHS) is seeking a River Surveyor instrument to ensure operational continuity in the event of equipment failure. An identical vessel-mounted acoustic doppler profiler is required to maintain interoperability with existing vessel mounting hardware and software.

#### Technical Specifications
* UNSPSC Code: 41114200 (Land surveying instruments)
* UNSPSC Description: Land surveying instruments
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

#### Contact Information
* Contracting Entity:  Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
* End-User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6, Canada
* Contact Person: Stein, Shaylan (SPAC/PSPC) (they/he)
* Contact Information: [shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Trade Agreements
The procurement is subject to the terms of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
